title: Software Development Engineer Intern
description: I joined Amazon's People Experience Technology (PXT) team to build internal tools that contributes to the organization's operational excellence goals.

Some of my contributions include building data pipelines and dashboards that enhance client usage visibilities, creating systematic client migration procedure and tools, and resolving tickets for on-call engineers.
Tech Stack: Java, Python, AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, CloudWatch, API Gateway, etc.), TypeScript, Node.js, bash.

title: Software Development Intern
description: I worked as a Full-Stack Developer intern under the Financial Innovation Technology department at iSoftStone. In here, I collaborated with one of the enterprise clients to develop the administrator system regarding automobile insurance.

I was responsible for the full-stack design and implementation of multiple modules, including user management, role management, permission management, and data visualization. I also optimized several existing features to enhance user experience and system performance.
The project was successfully deployed and is currently in use by the client, receiving positive feedback for its functionality and user-friendly interface.
Tech Stack: Java, Spring, Spring Boot, MyBatis-Plus, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Ajax, OracleDB.
